text_block_list.text:
The day of the Fan Appreciation Festival has arrived.
It's a school event with various activities for the fans who usually support us.
As for Matikanetannhauser——

text_block_list.name: Audience
text_block_list.text: Go for it! Ma-chi-tan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I'll hit it, a home run!
Hmph!
(Whoa...!)
She had been roped into the class vs. class softball tournament.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...Tannhauser-san, just to confirm, do you understand the current situation?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Of course! Bottom of the 6th, 10-0!
We're in danger of a mercy rule loss, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And right now, there are two outs.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So that means if I just hit a home run, we can still manage, right?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: That might be the case, but...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Nah, I ain't gonna say any more.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Our class's fate is in your hands!
Tannhauser, go get 'em!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aye-aye!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
The 7th batter is Tannhauser-san.
From what we've seen so far, she doesn't seem particularly skilled at baseball either.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But... I won't hold back against any opponent,
that's what top-tier pitching is all about!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hah!
(Crack...!)

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
It's not a home run...
but it's a big hit!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And Light, you missed the catch!
Run, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: U, uooooh~~!!

Matikanetannhauser takes off running!
She crosses first, second, and third base,
and dashes toward home plate!
However, a powerful throw back to home from Light, who's regained her composure, is closing in...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Slide in!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hyaa~~!
The result is——

text_block_list.name: Umpire
text_block_list.text: Out!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? No way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah—
My hand just barely didn't reach home plate!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nya~, sorry!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Aww, that's so Tannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: But to hit a hit like that under all that pressure... impressive as always.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the fun softball game.
It was really exciting and entertaining~.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
The ending was so typical of Matikanetannhauser-san,
it warmed my heart. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yah~, I'm so embarrassed...
They may have lost... but the fans seemed to enjoy it well enough!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: This is...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A home run!? No way!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whaat!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, right, I gotta run!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, I did it!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
As expected of Tannhauser!
She's got nerves of steel~!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Can she make a comeback from here!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Grr...!
Not bad, Tannhauser-san...!
Just as she declared, she hit a home run, and the team gained momentum. However—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah,
we didn't score a single point after that.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: King-san's switch flipped, and her blazing fastball was so fast.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: But that home run in the bottom of the 6th inning was really intense!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Right, Tannhauser-san, being able to deliver when it counts, was so cool~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, thank you. Usually, I'm worse when it counts, though.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But I'm glad everyone had fun!

In the end, they lost...
But the fans seemed to have a great time!
